name: Jack Rugile
title: Front End Web & Game Developer
description: I'm a front end web and game developer with professional experience in the agency realm. My ambition is to create interactive experiences that bring people joy and solve problems. I take pride in my work and want to leave the web better than I found it. I'm looking to collaborate with a team of innovative professionals who are dedicated to their craft.

items.title: Front End Developer
details: Worked on a variety of projects including microsites and games for companies like YouTube, Dominos, and Capital One.
Created a morphing WebGL particle system for a landing hub for Omnia Clubs, a reputable set of international nightclubs.
Leveraged React, Vue.js, Three.js, Pixi.js, Phaser, and many other tools alongside core vanilla JavaScript skills.

items.title: Front End Developer
details: Focused primarily on music industry sites for nightclubs and musicians like Michael Franti and The String Cheese Incident.
Developed websites for some of the largest music festivals, such as Electric Daisy Carnival and Electric Forest.
Built custom WordPress themes and admin setups to make the CMS experience as streamlined as possible for clients.
Created a schedule building app that allowed festival goers to plan and share their experience on social media.
